Sentencas: A novel anode with a Ni0.5Cu0.5Fe2O4 (NCFO)-BaZr0.1Ce0.7Y0.1Yb0.1O3-delta (BZCYYb) composite on NiO-Y2O3 stabilized ZrO2 (YSZ) is fabricated and investigated in dry and wet (3 mol% H2O) CH4 at temperatures ranging from 650 to 800 degrees C.
Titulo: BaZr0.1Ce0.7Y0.1Yb0.1O3-δ enhanced coking-free on-cell reforming for direct-methane solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: For comparison, a conventional NiO-YSZ anode is also prepared.
Titulo: BaZr0.1Ce0.7Y0.1Yb0.1O3-δ enhanced coking-free on-cell reforming for direct-methane solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In H-2-3 mol% H2O at 600 degrees C for 2 h, NCFO and NiO are fully reduced to Ni-Cu-Fe alloys (NCF) and Ni, respectively, forming bi-layer NCF-BZCYYb/Ni-YSZ (BL) and single-layer Ni-YSZ (SL) anodes.
Titulo: BaZr0.1Ce0.7Y0.1Yb0.1O3-δ enhanced coking-free on-cell reforming for direct-methane solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The polarization resistance of the BL anode in dry and wet CH4 is only approximately 1/5 of that of the SL anode due to the enhancement of NCF-BZCYYb on CH4 oxidation.
Titulo: BaZr0.1Ce0.7Y0.1Yb0.1O3-δ enhanced coking-free on-cell reforming for direct-methane solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This improvement is also supported by the results from DC polarization.
Titulo: BaZr0.1Ce0.7Y0.1Yb0.1O3-δ enhanced coking-free on-cell reforming for direct-methane solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Carbon deposition is inhibited in the BL anode by adding only 3 mol% H2O into dry CH4 and the carbon formed in dry CH4 can be removed by subsequent exposure of the BL anode to wet CH4.
Titulo: BaZr0.1Ce0.7Y0.1Yb0.1O3-δ enhanced coking-free on-cell reforming for direct-methane solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The overall electrochemical performance of the BL anode is significantly stable in wet CH4, which suggests that it is promising for applications in direct CH4 solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: BaZr0.1Ce0.7Y0.1Yb0.1O3-δ enhanced coking-free on-cell reforming for direct-methane solid oxide fuel cells
